This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features and benefits that make it an invaluable addition to your collection. I understand its worth to me is $120, but I'm willing to be flexible. How about we start with an offer of $110? I believe this could be a mutually beneficial deal for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110.
